description: The Straw Hats arrive at Water 7 and exchange their Skypiea gold for 300 million beli. Zoro easily defeats members of the Franky Family who attempt to rob them. The crew meets Kaku from Galley-La Company, but while Luffy speaks with Iceburg, the Franky Family successfully steals two suitcases containing 200 million beli.

events.title: Franky Family Confronts Zoro
events.description: Members of the Franky Family approach Zoro and attempt to intimidate him, revealing themselves as the group that attacked their ship. They challenge Zoro to a fight.
events.significance: First encounter with the Franky Family, establishing them as initial antagonists in Water 7 and setting up the conflict over the stolen money.

quotes.speaker: Franky Family Members
quotes.context: The group reveals their identity to Zoro

events.title: Zoro Defeats the Franky Family
events.description: Zoro easily defeats multiple members of the Franky Family with minimal effort, demonstrating the vast difference in their combat abilities. The Franky Family members are left defeated on the ground.
events.significance: Shows Zoro's strength and establishes that the Franky Family, while numerous, are no match for the Straw Hat Pirates in direct combat.

events.title: Kaku's Introduction
events.description: The Straw Hats meet Kaku, a carpenter from Galley-La Company Dock One. He is noted for his distinctive square nose, which Luffy and others compare to Usopp's long nose. Kaku agrees to assess the Going Merry's condition.
events.significance: Introduction of Kaku, who will play a crucial role in the Water 7 and Enies Lobby arcs. His true identity as a CP9 agent is unknown at this time.

quotes.text: I'll come check out your ship right away!
quotes.speaker: Kaku
quotes.context: Kaku agrees to assess the Going Merry for repairs

events.title: Gold Exchange Complete
events.description: The Straw Hats successfully exchange their Skypiea gold for 300 million beli in cash. The crew splits the money into multiple suitcases to manage the large sum.
events.significance: Establishes the crew's significant wealth from the Skypiea adventure, which becomes the target for the Franky Family and drives the upcoming conflict.

events.title: Meeting Iceburg
events.description: Luffy, Nami, and Usopp meet Iceburg, the mayor of Water 7 and president of Galley-La Company. He is introduced as a charismatic and important figure in the city, accompanied by his secretary Kalifa.
events.significance: Introduction of Iceburg, a central character in the Water 7 Arc who holds the Pluton blueprints and becomes the target of CP9's assassination attempts.

quotes.text: Oh my, pirates? Welcome to Water 7.
quotes.speaker: Iceburg
quotes.context: Iceburg casually greets the Straw Hats despite knowing they are pirates

events.title: The Franky Family Steals 200 Million Beli
events.description: While Luffy is distracted talking with Iceburg, members of the Franky Family successfully steal two suitcases containing 200 million beli from the Straw Hats' money. They escape before anyone notices.
events.significance: This theft becomes the catalyst for major events in the Water 7 Arc, leading to Usopp's later beating, the confrontation at Franky House, and ultimately Usopp's temporary departure from the crew.

events.title: Robin Follows Mysterious Masked Figure
events.description: Sanji spots Robin following a mysterious person wearing a mask and cloak through the streets of Water 7. When Sanji tries to follow them around a corner, both Robin and the masked figure have disappeared.
events.significance: First hint at the CP9 conspiracy and Robin's secret involvement with them. This mysterious encounter foreshadows Robin's later disappearance and the revelation of her past with the World Government.

events.title: Exploring Water 7
events.description: The Straw Hats begin exploring the unique Water 7 city, marveling at its water-based transportation system using Yagara Bulls and the intricate network of canals and sidewalks.
events.significance: Establishes Water 7's distinctive geography and culture, setting the stage for the arc's events in this unique maritime city.

events.title: Kalifa's Introduction
events.description: Kalifa appears as Iceburg's secretary, demonstrating her professional demeanor and loyalty to the mayor. She accompanies Iceburg and helps manage his schedule.
events.significance: Introduction of Kalifa, whose true identity as a CP9 agent is concealed. She will play a key role in the assassination attempt on Iceburg.

events.title: Sanji's Market Shopping
events.description: Sanji visits the local markets in Water 7 to buy fresh ingredients and supplies. He navigates the confusing maze-like sidewalks of the city while shopping from various vendors.
events.significance: Shows the daily life and culture of Water 7, while also positioning Sanji to later witness Robin with the mysterious masked figure.

quotes.text: I'll come check out your ship right away!
quotes.speaker: Kaku
quotes.context: Agreeing to assess the Going Merry

quotes.text: Oh my, pirates? Welcome to Water 7.
quotes.speaker: Iceburg

themes.description: The episode introduces several characters who appear friendly but harbor secret identities and agendas. Kaku and Kalifa are secretly CP9 agents, while the Franky Family appears as simple thugs but will later become allies.
themes.symbolism: The masked figure that Robin follows represents the hidden truths and secret plots that will unfold in Water 7.

themes.description: Despite their newfound wealth from Skypiea, the Straw Hats quickly become targets. Their money is stolen, showing that wealth brings new challenges and dangers.
themes.symbolism: The stolen suitcases represent how material wealth can be easily lost and how it attracts unwanted attention.

characterSpotlights.development: Zoro demonstrates his strength by easily defeating the Franky Family members, showing how much stronger the Straw Hats have become.
Kaku is introduced as a friendly and helpful member of Galley-La Company, offering to assess the Going Merry. His true nature as a CP9 agent remains hidden.
keyActions: Offers to inspect the Going Merry
quotes: I'll come check out your ship right away!

characterSpotlights.development: Iceburg is introduced as the charismatic mayor of Water 7 and president of Galley-La Company, showing a relaxed attitude despite meeting pirates.
keyActions: Displays his casual but authoritative demeanor
Is accompanied by his secretary Kalifa
quotes: Oh my, pirates? Welcome to Water 7.

characterSpotlights.development: Robin's mysterious behavior begins to emerge as she is seen following a masked figure, hinting at her secret involvement with forces unknown to the crew.
keyActions: Is spotted by Sanji but remains elusive

mangaDifferences.difference: The anime extends some scenes of the Straw Hats exploring Water 7 to show more of the city's unique architecture and culture.
Some interactions between the Franky Family members and Zoro are extended in the anime to showcase the fight more clearly.

trivia.fact: This episode marks the first appearance of the ending theme 'Eternal Pose' by Asia Engineer, which would be used for episodes 231-245.
Kaku's distinctive square nose was designed to parallel Usopp's long nose, creating a visual connection between the two characters.
Episode 231 adapts portions of manga chapters 325 and 326, showing the anime's typical pacing during the Water 7 Arc.
The Franky Family stealing the money in this episode sets up one of the most emotionally devastating arcs in One Piece, leading to Usopp's temporary departure from the crew.
Iceburg's voice actor in Japanese, Izō Oikawa, also voiced other notable characters in various anime series.
